headline: Carnival Corporation & (NYSE:CCL) Faces 17% Dip As Board Member Steps Down
summary: Carnival Corporation & (NYSE:CCL) saw its share price decline by 17% last week, coinciding with the announcement that board member Ms. Sara Mathew will step down mid-April. Despite no further company-specific updates, this decrease occurred alongside a broader market downturn; the Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 4% as escalating trade tensions sparked investor concerns. As a result, the effect of Ms. Mathew's departure on Carnival's stock performance was potentially compounded by broader...
